REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0632 reute r f BC-STEP-SAVER-<CODA>-SAY 04-09 0056

TEXT.TITLE: STEP-SAVER <CODA> SAYS WARRANT EXERCISED
TEXT.BODY: Step-Saver Data Systems Inc said Bergen-Richards Corp has exercised a warrant to buy 450,000 Step-Saver shares at two dlrs each. It said warrants issued to the underwriter in its initial public offering were exercised in March for an aggregate of 169,200 dlrs. Reuter
